availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A New Orleans cotton and sugar merchant firm. Already in business in 1855. Possibly dissolved upon the death of John Watt, in 1868, but not sure.

bibl.p: Cohen's New Orleans Directory for 1855, (New Orleans: Office of the Picayune, 1855), 255, 265.

Find A Grave, Entry for John Watt (1802-1868), Find A Grave Memorial # 70830665, Metairie Cemetery, New Orleans, Orleans Parish, Louisiana, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=watt&GSfn=john&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=20&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=70830665&df=all& (accessed 7 Aug 2017).
